name: Bane
title: Atropos
lore: When the gods have nightmares, it is Bane Elemental who brings them. From the Plane of Dreams, he serves Nyctasha.

enfeeble.name: Enfeeble
enfeeble.description: Weakens an enemy, reducing their status resistance and magic resistance.

brainSap.name: Brain Sap
brainSap.description: Feasts on the target's brain, dealing damage and healing Bane for the same amount.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.description: Puts a target to sleep, making them invulnerable but unable to act. Damage wakes them.

fiendGrip.name: Fiend's Grip
fiendGrip.description: Grips an enemy with nightmarish force, stunning and draining their mana while dealing damage.
